page.title: 09Friday Bridge Church
page.content: the church was built in 1864 and the naem of it is St Mark's church. There is something unusual about the spire. It is leaning because the peat dried out. Father Gunn said in 50 years time they might have to remove the spire. The church has 51 gravestones. The Chapeldown Back Road was built in 1843 and the last service was about 1975. Now the chapel is used for a fruit and vegetable store. The Chapel was built in 1862. It is now empty because the engineering firm has moved to larger premises.
